    A

    Adds an ActionListener for the "Filter by Category" button.
    addClearFilterListener(ActionListener) - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView
    Adds an ActionListener for the "Clear Filter" button.
    addTransaction(double, String) - Method in class controller.ExpenseTrackerController
    Adds a transaction to the model if valid and updates the view.
    addTransaction(Transaction) - Method in class model.ExpenseTrackerModel
    Adds a non-null transaction to the model.
    addUndoTransactionListener(ActionListener) - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView
    Registers an ActionListener for the "Remove Last Transaction" button.
    AmountFilter - Class in model.Filter
    Concrete strategy that filters transactions based on an exact amount.
    AmountFilter(double) - Constructor for class model.Filter.AmountFilter
    Constructs an AmountFilter with the given amount.
    applyFilter() - Method in class controller.ExpenseTrackerController
    Applies the current filter to the transaction list and updates the view with the filtered transactions.

    Constructs the Expense Tracker GUI, initializes all UI components, and sets up layout and event wiring.

    F

    filter(List<Transaction>) - Method in class model.Filter.AmountFilter
    Filters the provided list of transactions, returning only those whose amount matches the specified amount.
    filter(List<Transaction>) - Method in class model.Filter.CategoryFilter
    Filters the provided list of transactions, returning only those whose category matches the specified category.
    filter(List<Transaction>) - Method in interface model.Filter.TransactionFilter
    Filters the provided list of transactions based on a specific strategy.

    I

    InputValidation - Class in controller
    Utility class providing static methods to validate user input such as transaction amount and category.
    isValidAmount(double) - Static method in class controller.InputValidation
    Checks whether the given amount is a valid transaction value.
    isValidCategory(String) - Static method in class controller.InputValidation
    Validates the category string to ensure it is non-empty, alphabetical, and matches one of the allowed categories: food, travel, bills, entertainment, other.

    R

    refresh() - Method in class controller.ExpenseTrackerController
    Refreshes the table in the view with the current transactions from the model.
    refreshTable(List<Transaction>) - Method in class view.ExpenseTrackerView
    Refreshes the transactions table with the given list.
    removeLastTransaction() - Method in class controller.ExpenseTrackerController
    Removes the last transaction using model and refreshes the table.
    removeLastTransaction() - Method in class model.ExpenseTrackerModel
    Removes the last transaction and pushes it to the undo stack.
    removeTransaction(Transaction) - Method in class model.ExpenseTrackerModel
    Removes the specified transaction from the model.

    T
